extracted_playbook.title: Implement and Enforce Backup and Restoration Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain offline backups of data, regularly test backup and restoration, ensure all backup data is encrypted and immutable, activate BitLocker, and securely back up BitLocker keys.

extracted_playbook.title: Patch and Update Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Install updates/patch operating systems, software, and firmware as soon as updates/patches are released. Regularly check software updates and end-of-life notifications. Use a centralized patch management system. Immediately patch software affected by specified CVEs.

extracted_playbook.title: Evaluate and Update Blocklists and Allowlists
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly evaluate and update blocklists and allowlists. Add key artifact files used by FortiOS to execution blocklist if FortiOS is not used.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure User Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Audit user accounts with administrative privileges and configure access controls under the principles of least privilege and separation of duties. Require administrator credentials to install software.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multifactor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Use multifactor authentication where possible, particularly for webmail, VPNs, accounts that access critical systems, and privileged accounts that manage backups.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Strong Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Require all accounts with password logins to have strong, unique passwords.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure and Monitor RDP and Other Potentially Risky Services
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict RDP to limit access to resources over internal networks. Use a VPN for external RDP access. Disable unused remote access/RDP ports. Monitor remote access/RDP logs and enforce account lockouts.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Antivirus Programs
extracted_playbook.description: Install and regularly update antivirus and anti-malware software on all hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Only use secure networks. Consider installing and using a VPN for remote access.
